tpk::PointCat

tpk::PointCat Class Reference

#include <PointCat.h>

Collaboration diagram for tpk::PointCat:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Catalogue of pointing calibration stars.

A PointCat is initialized by reading a file of star positions (in the format used by TPOINT). Each star is given an index number that can be used to retrieve a star's catalog position and approximate current observed Az,El.

Each star also has a flag (an int) associated with it and this can be used by the application fo any purpose, for example to keep track of which stars have been observed; the values assigned to the flag are not used within the class.
